description: This file defines functions for managing and propagating request context information such as request IDs and client labels in a web API using FastAPI. It includes logic to generate request IDs when absent and updates request and response objects with relevant headers and state.

methods.name: str _ensure_request_id(incoming: Optional[str])
methods.description: Generates or reuses an existing request ID, creating a new UUID if no valid ID is provided.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] label_context( request: Request, response: Response, x_client_label: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="X-Client-Label"), x_request_id: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="X-Request-ID"), )
methods.description: Captures client label and request ID from HTTP headers, updates request state and response headers for traceability, and returns a context dictionary.

ctags.name: label_context
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, response: Response, x_client_label: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="X-Client-Label"), x_request_id: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="X-Request-ID"), )
